name: BulkDeleteCustomers
description:
Deletes multiple customer profiles at once.

Use this tool to remove several customer profiles in a single action by providing their IDs. It returns a map of responses detailing the outcome for each profile.

parameters.name: customer_profile_ids
parameters.description: Array of customer profile IDs to be deleted.

value_schema.description: The IDs of the [customer profiles](entity:Customer) to delete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: customer_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the [customer profiles](entity:Customer) to delete.

value_schema.description: The IDs of the [customer profiles](entity:Customer) to delete.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
